Sentencas: Thin-film based, low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFCs) have gained much attention due to their capability to reduce the operating temperature (<450 degrees C) and the ensuing extended life and reduced cost, compared to conventional SOFCs.
Titulo: Robust nano-architectured composite thin films for a low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: While highly porous and continuously connected Pt thin films are viewed as an attractive cathode, they are readily apt to sinter and grow into larger, isolated crystallites upon annealing, leading to severe degradation of the cathode performance over time.
Titulo: Robust nano-architectured composite thin films for a low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: Here, we address this issue by fabricating a post-encapsulated composite structure, in which gas-permeable and catalytically active solid electrolytes surround porous Pt electrodes.
Titulo: Robust nano-architectured composite thin films for a low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: Nanoporous Pt thin films deposited onto a yttriastabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) single-crystal substrate are uniformly coated with Sm-doped CeO2 (SDC) via a simple, cost-effective and scalable coating method known as cathodic electrochemical deposition (CELD).
Titulo: Robust nano-architectured composite thin films for a low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: Physical characterization of the nanostructured Pt/SDC composite thin films is done using a range of tools, in this case SEM, TEM, XRD and ICP-MS. AC impedance spectroscopy (ACIS) of symmetric cells (cathode| electrolyte| cathode) with SDC coatings reveals that the enhanced Pt-SDC interactions led to exceptionally high ORR activity and outstanding thermal stability.
Titulo: Robust nano-architectured composite thin films for a low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: These observations provide new directions for the achievement of a robust and catalytically active LT-SOFC cathode through modification of the metal surface.
Titulo: Robust nano-architectured composite thin films for a low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell cathode
